content: Hello all, who's in town atm? Is there some chat/group we can use to coordinate? I'd be down to some pubbing this evening with whoever is around. :smile:

We used the adjoint school Zulip to coordinate last week, but we should converge to this Zulip for this week.

Nothing has been planned for tonight yet (many people went on hikes and are not back yet).
Unfortunately I am not a member of this year's adjoint school
But if you are going to go somewhere and it's not an adjoint school-only event please share the information!
We are probably heading to get food at Mezcal if they have enough room. We will be there in about 15minutes
Nice! I'm already having dinner but let me know if you change place, I'll try to join as soon as I'm done. :smile:
